p: Fourthly, government urgently investigated the service capacity of the city’s two-level critical care centers and maternal and child health hospitals for COVID-19 (including negative pressure ward, negative pressure delivery room, and negative pressure operating room), and determined the list of institutions for admission and treatment of confirmed and suspected cases distributed in 22 districts and counties throughout the city, and announced it to the public. At the same time, the municipal Emergency Delivery Office promptly forwarded the “Letter of information on the close contact of XX from the maternal and child health care institutions” for reference of midwifery institutions.
